rewritten_resume.professional_summary: Dynamic IT professional with extensive experience in network and system administration, adept at managing IT support for large user bases and optimizing performance. Proven track record in reducing downtime and improving efficiency through proactive maintenance and troubleshooting. Strong leadership and training skills, with a commitment to service excellence and continuous learning.

experience.title: IT Support Specialist
responsibilities: Managed IT support for over 600 endpoints and 900 users, ensuring optimal performance and minimal downtime through proactive maintenance and troubleshooting.
Administered Microsoft Active Directory and Office 365, optimizing access control and supporting a user base of over 900.
Monitored and configured network infrastructure across 100+ locations, achieving 98% uptime and ensuring business continuity.
Contributed to IT infrastructure planning for $6M+ projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams to align on goals and deliverables.

experience.title: Web Development Intern
responsibilities: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to implement secure data protection and multi-factor authentication, preventing fines of up to $250,000.
